OrgName: Ashfield Commercial & Medical Services, an Ashfield Healthcare LLC company
activities:
Ashfield Healthcare LLC is a contract sales and marketing organisation which provides sales and educational services to the healthcare in Europe and the United States.
Data is shared between the US and European offices which includes:
Personal Details
Family, Lifestyle and Social Circumstances
Goods or Services Provided
Health Records
Details of service users usual and previous medical advisors
Medical History
Medical Procedures
Details of other drugs and treatments

All data is used to support the ongoing development of the targetted sales forces both within the UK and Europe and to develop educational and training courses for service users and health professionals.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President Op Ex & QA
personaldata: Off-line, On-line, Manually Processed Data, service user data, client data
recoursemech: Ashfield has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, operated by the American Arbitration Association. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Ashfield, please visit the ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor web site at ICDR/AAA Dispute Resolution for more information and to file a complaint.
